title: First Win of the Day Mission not completing

replies.body: Yeah, I got the mission after winning another game, but that first game didn't give me anything. It's just been taking 2 wins to proc the mission for me.

It might have just taken a min for the mission to fully complete due to some weird delay, but I do see that you've completed a First Win of the Day mission today (11/15). It was completed around 5:11 PST. You should see the mission completed and the time until it resets in your mission list.

Could you try refreshing your client to see if that mission will update for you?
